name: deimosrising
text: The first Ray/Todd business venture. This will come up again later.

name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by silver_lake, apricotta, BillyLK, nutmeg, Garyos)

name: zem
text: A comment left by zem was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by fakead, autrepoupee, Darthemed)

name: zem
text: to clarify: it would not be lame without the gun

name: soticoto
text: Only unintelligible to anyone who doesn't speak lazyarse-language.

name: trevor328
text: Lyle acaba de tirar al VCR normal con eso pistola. No trabajaría con sus cintas de sexo.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Oh, I guess I can read Spanish. That's weird.

name: hellaedgar
text:
Translated:

Panel 1 "Today, in Spanish!"

Panel 2 T-ADORE: "Where is our regular VCR, Lyle?"

LYLE: "That IS our regular VCR! Don't bug me!"

PANEL 3 T-ADORE: "No! No! Our VCR is a "Sony" but this VCR is called a "Clo-Max."

PANEL 4, MEANWHILE TODD: "Ladies and Gentlemen! Thank you... thank you! Today! The Cat With The Secret!"

PANEL 5 TODD: "Mr. Ray, you have a big secret, yes?"

RAY: "Yes, yes."

PANEL 6 TODD: "Six more dollars! Everyone! Six more!"

name: saurkraus
text: Thanks! :)

name: nutmeg
text: i forgot what "molestar" meant, so i was hoping it was "to molest."

name: _cheesekayke
text: My eighth-grade class was very unsettled when my Spanish teacher attempted to introduce the common expression "No me molesta" into our vocabulary. There was a bit of a misunderstanding.

name: steerpike66
text: I like the fact that 'Don Not Disturb' signs in French hotels say 'Ne Pas Deranger'. I will not be bothered by disturbed chamber maids.

name: i_love_kate
text: Alternate third panel: Teodor molests Lyle.

name: belgand
text:
Excellent. Despite not actually taking any Spanish, knowing anyone who speaks it, or any other proper exposure I was able to more or less accurately translate that. Latin helps a lot. AS does, well, just learning basic phrases which everyone does as a course of living.

Thankfully I now know how to say "What?" in a number of languages. No longer will I be confused solely in English.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: The cat has a grand secret.

name: kilroywashere
text: Which apparently involves opening his towel...?

name: silver_lake
text: It has EVERYTHING to do with Ray opening his towel. What is is secret? Will we finally see? Five years later, I'm guessing no.

name: killerlimpet
text: That he can still sport wood.

name: semiquaver
text: Hells yes he can still sport wood.

name: sirfrederick
text: Not until you pay six more dollars.

name: coco
text: I feel like Ray was disappointed in the last panel about having to hold off on opening his towel . . .

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Seis Hundo mas dolares, TODOS!

name: epicurus
text: I can totally picture Ray's disinterested tone when he says "Si, si."

name: ethelthefrog
text: I see it as more of a tone meant to entice, to intrigue passersby and let them know they must pay up in order to see his secret, and that his secret is worth seeing.  He is a businessman after all.

name: quantumcasaba
text: For some reason I am hearing Ray with an affected girl's voice, a la the 'hennifa lopay' hand puppet from South Park.

name: epicurus
text: On rereading, I think you're right. I think he's probably saying it with affected gravity. Although the "girl's voice" theory has its merit, since his secret is evidently under his towel.

name: m3funkyb
text: the look on lyles face classic

name: qatipay
text: what is happening with Lyle's arm/gun/collar area in the third panel? are my eyes just getting confused?

name: goosey
text: He's cleaning it. That... thing... is a cleaning rag. I think.

name: joeyramoney
text: you're seeing the frayed edge of his sleeve (or sleeve less area) overlap his arm.

name: trevor328
text:
In panel two he has his right arm behind his back while his left arm is holding out a bottle of Jack Daniels. In the third panel he has his left arm behind his back and he is examining the pistol in his right hand.

He is contemplating which one to use--which one will be more effective at solving his problems.

name: tom-ba
text: And if you happen to be Lyle's problem to be solved with either a gun or a bottle of Jack Daniels, opt for the JD.

name: zedpower
text: Lyle: pro ice.

name: joeyramoney
text: lyle is always about to molesta something.

name: quantumcasaba
text: I am slightly disturbed by Ray's obscured right nipple in 4/5. Or perhaps disturbed by the loneliness of the left one.

name: professorriffs
text: Why is this one rated so low?  The thing kills me.

name: carlyle
text: Everything is right about this comic.
